project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a specified city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project structure and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests)
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse and extract the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the fetched data
Implement functionality to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the functionality to ensure API data fetching and parsing work as expected
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
